alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 10:54AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central San Benito and western Monterey Counties through 1130 AM PST... At 1054 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hollister to 13 miles southwest of Esalen Institute. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salinas, Hollister, Jamesburg, Lucia, Arroyo Seco, Big Sur Village, Tassajara Hot Springs, Gorda, Soledad, Greenfield, King City, Gonzales, Carmel Valley Village, Andrew Molera State Park, Partington Ridge, Pico Blanco Campground, Julia Pfeiffer Burns State Park, Sycamore Flat, Ridgemark and Colman Canyon. This includes Highway 1 near Mile Marker 15, between Mile Markers 17 and 23, near Mile Marker 25, between Mile Markers 32 and 34, near Mile Marker 40, and between Mile Markers 42 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
